trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Canby
There were no other sightings in Canby on or around August 16th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailswas outside watering the crops and noticed what i thought was a bright star,then it started heading in my direction then came to a stop,thats when i ran into the house to get my cell phone to get some pics and yell for my wife,who came out,saw it also. the object zigzaged,seemed to come lower,(glow got alot brighter)then headed off east over my property,over the highway towards oregon city.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: large egg/oval shaped, bright white(solid glow).
